Package info.oais.infomodel.implementation

Class ArchivalInformationPackageRefImpl

java.lang.Object
info.oais.infomodel.implementation.DataObjectRefImpl
info.oais.infomodel.implementation.DigitalObjectRefImpl
info.oais.infomodel.implementation.InformationPackageRefImpl
info.oais.infomodel.implementation.ArchivalInformationPackageRefImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArchivalInformationPackage, DataObject, DigitalObject, InformationPackage
public class ArchivalInformationPackageRefImpl extends InformationPackageRefImpl implements ArchivalInformationPackage
Archival Information Package implementation This complements the basic InformationPackage this has:
  • PreservationDescriptionInformation
  • IsComplete - declares whether or not the AIP is complete
Author:
david
